name: Retail ready photos by Pixc
author: Pixc inc.

sections.description:
We make your product photos look beautiful and professional so you can increase your online sales conversions.

  • We make your product photos look beautiful to help you sell more
  • Save time and money editing your product photos
  • Product images returned within 24 hours, always!

Did you know 67% of online consumers consider clear, high quality photos to be more important than product information AND customer ratings.

Increase your online sales

Give your photos a professional look with a white background and touchup.

Fast delivery

Your time is valuable, so send us your photos and we’ll have them looking great in under 24 hours.

Cost effective

The first image is free to make sure you are happy with the quality. After that it’s as little as US$1.60

How it works

  1. Install plugin Install our Pixc plugin into your WooCommerce store.
  2. Snap! Take a photo of your item
  3. Upload Select and upload your photos via your computer or Dropbox.
  4. Sell online sooner Your image will be ready and back in your inbox within less than 24 hours which means you can sell your products sooner

Try it today – You get 5 images free!

Read more about Pixc at www.pixc.com
sections.installation:
1. Upload optimized-product-photos to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to admin panel (/wp-admin/) and you will find Pixc app at WooCommerce -> Pixc
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload optimized-product-photos to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to admin panel (/wp-admin/) and you will find Pixc app at WooCommerce -> Pixc
